channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weather Gone Viral
channel.desc: Hurricane Ian creates a dangerously high storm surge when it makes landfall on the Gulf Coast of Florida; a significant storm spawns 47 tornadoes across five states; a deadly derecho in Canada, with gusts over 80 mph, causes massive property damage.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weather Gone Viral
channel.desc: A dangerous EF-3 tornado forms outside of Houston, Texas; an epic snowstorm buries Buffalo, N.Y.; a rogue wave at a California beach sweeps beachgoers off their feet.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: So You Think You'd Survive?
channel.desc: Altitude sickness, speedboat disasters, deadly power outages and hungry mountain lions.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: So You Think You'd Survive?
channel.desc: Deadly black ice, intense sandstorms, disasters at the beach, and hungry alligators.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: So You Think You'd Survive?
channel.desc: What to do if a hurricane is approaching your hotel; how to respond to a semi sliding straight toward your car.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Tornado Alley
channel.desc: An EF-4 multiple-vortex tornado rips through the heart of Tuscaloosa, Ala., leaving a path of destruction 80 miles long and clocking 190-mile-per-hour winds.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Tornado Alley
channel.desc: On November 17, 2013 an EF4 tornado struck the town of Washington, Illinois as part of a deadly tornado outbreak across the mid-west.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Tornado Alley
channel.desc: A shelter provides refuge from the storm until it becomes a trap; a grandmother who runs a daycare, saves herself and three toddlers by taking cover in a bathtub; a neighbor feels guilty for leaving a woman caught outside.

channel.title: America's Weekend Headquarters
channel.desc: The science and stories of weather, plus in-depth forecasts with a focus on weekend weather.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weekend Recharge
channel.desc: Though it has "weekend" in the title, this show discusses the week ahead in addition to offering suggestions for what to do on Saturday and Sunday. Weather Channel meteorologists go beyond the elements outside and into the realm of lifestyle tips. Each host has a recurring segment on "Weekend Recharge," which include helping parents get a fresh start to each day and explaining how the weather is expected to impact the weekend's scheduled sports action.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Backroad Truckers
channel.desc: Big Donny's senior drivers battle each other in the far north, while his most junior races to a hydro plant that can't restore power without her; when a competitor ups his game, Donny discovers his hotshotting empire is under attack.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Backroad Truckers
channel.desc: Big Donny dispatches his entire crew to a challenging roadside crash recovery, but things go sideways when Craig is missing-in-action on the job. Angela struggles when she's sidelined after her truck breaks down on a hotshot mission.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heavy Rescue: 401
channel.desc: Rookie Sonny faces a 40-car pile-up that turns a major highway into a war zone;a fierce storm triggers a triple-semi crash; a father-son team race to clear the road as weather blasts in.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heavy Rescue: 401
channel.desc: A semi-truck crash shuts down a crucial border route; rookie heavy rescue driver Sonny helps a trucker stuck on a dangerous stretch of highway; a tanker wreck causes commuter chaos in Toronto.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heavy Rescue: 401
channel.desc: A courier truck rolls over; a vicious storm puts Mark in the middle of a crash zone; the crew dives for cover during an icy airbag job.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heavy Rescue: 401
channel.desc: James and Bubba recover a semi smashed into a building; Kevin faces problems with a tractor-trailer crashed in deep mud.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Timber Titans
channel.desc: Four logging companies in British Columbia fight extreme weather and terrain to ethically harvest one of Canada's most vital resources.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Claw Hunters
channel.desc: Blake struggles with a hand injury, while Mack grapples with superstitions and Captain Greg closely monitors lobster prices.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Claw Hunters
channel.desc: Captain Gail deals with more gear sabotage, while the rest of the captains try to maximise their time on the water amid the dropping North Atlantic temperatures.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Claw Hunters
channel.desc: Maine's top lobster restaurant confronts the struggles of running a business during the slow winter months, while Greg fishes for ghost gear.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heroes & Survivors
channel.desc: Winds whip up a deadly wildfire that torches a town; ferocious ocean waves leave storm watchers stranded; white water rafters are pummeled by rain and rocks during a trip down the Grand Canyon.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heroes & Survivors
channel.desc: A microburst in Mexico brings down a plane; a rare tornado outbreak catches an entire town off guard; alone in the Atlantic, a 70-year-old solo rower battles a fierce ocean storm; wild white waters sweep away a hiker.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadline to Disaster
channel.desc: Hurricane Ida strikes the Louisiana coast 16 years after Hurricane Katrina, following a destructive path from the low-lying parishes to the cities of the Northeastern United States.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadline to Disaster
channel.desc: Downslope winds gusting over 100 miles per hour drive an enormous wildfire into residential areas around Boulder, Colo., forcing a frantic evacuation.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadline to Disaster
channel.desc: Residents fear for their lives as Florida's Gulf Coast is struck by a powerful Category 4 Hurricane, bringing deadly surge and catastrophic winds.

channel.desc: Awe-inspiring and jaw-dropping meteorological marvels.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
channel.desc: A semi bursts into flames, pushing Jesse and crew to make an urgent recovery; Mountain Recovery fights to free a jackknife during a big storm.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
channel.desc: After a tractor pulling double trailers rolls over during a freak snowstorm, Mountain Recovery faces massive damage and an impossible deadline; heavy winds assault I-80 in Wyoming, closing the highway and pushing Jim and Brendan to their limits.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
channel.desc: When freezing fog ices over I-80, Brendan gets his first test on a rollover recovery; heavy snow causes chaos for Big Jon and Kory as they battle a difficult jackknife; a moving van blasts off the highway in a snowstorm, pushing the Stauffer's team to perform a long pull up a steep incline.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Timber Titans
channel.desc: Four logging companies in British Columbia fight extreme weather and terrain to ethically harvest one of Canada's most vital resources.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Timber Titans
channel.desc: As the Peter's crew races to finish a long-delayed logging job, a critical machine failure threatens their deadline and their paychecks; the Integrated Operations team braces for lift-off as the heavy-lift helicopter arrives on the block.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Katrina 20
channel.desc: It's been 20 years since Hurricane Katrina, and we're taking you on a tour of the trail of destruction in this hour-long special. From New Orleans' lower Ninth Ward to the Mississippi Gulf Coast, we'll feature stories on survivors who are still dealing with the impacts of this devastating storm. Jim Cantore will revisit the Armed Forces Retirement Home in Gulfport, MS, where he rode out the hurricane, enduring nearly 30 feet of storm surge.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Timber Titans
channel.desc: Four logging companies in British Columbia fight extreme weather and terrain to ethically harvest one of Canada's most vital resources.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Timber Titans
channel.desc: As the Peter's crew races to finish a long-delayed logging job, a critical machine failure threatens their deadline and their paychecks; the Integrated Operations team braces for lift-off as the heavy-lift helicopter arrives on the block.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Highway Thru Hell
channel.desc: Cary Quiring is tasked with keeping crucial goods flowing; a wreck that brings three heavies out tests Jamie's new LA Rotator; Aggressive Towing tackles a crucial sideways transport.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Highway Thru Hell
channel.desc: James Luke and the Reliable team contend with two detoured wrecks on the same punishing corner of a narrow route; MSA's Kirpal and sons must stretch a long line to reach a machine stuck on a farm.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Highway Thru Hell
channel.desc: Al and Merv team up for a snowy tug of war; with the Canyon Highway closed, Jamie battles a fuel tanker to keep trains moving; a blockage on the only route through the Cascade Mountains forces MSA into a bold move.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Highway Thru Hell
channel.desc: Bone-chilling temperatures challenge the teams to pull off recoveries in punishing conditions; Dylan pushes Reliable's military rotator in a new way; media gets a sneak peek at an extraordinary repair effort on Coquihalla, closed after floods.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadman's Curse
channel.desc: The team in Bute Inlet continues to follow new leads in search of answers regarding a missing or murdered prospector, while David Muise inches closer to gold in Pitt Lake.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadman's Curse
channel.desc: A hidden 1940s map reveals new clues pointing to the motherlode; the team races season-ending weather through unexplored terrain to find an X that marks the spot where Slumach possibly found his gold.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Secrets of the Earth
channel.desc: Quicksand, grabbing unsuspecting victims in a mortal grip; whirlpools, the relentless swirls of water trapping entire boats in their swift vortices; rip currents, the hidden rivers of ocean water sweeping even strong swimmers beyond the waves.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Secrets of the Earth
channel.desc: Volcanic destruction; oxidized auto plants and overgrown homes go under the microscope; seeking to uncover the secrets of earthly repossession.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Secrets of the Earth
channel.desc: Thunderstorms create gigantic red and blue electrical shapes above the clouds; ice crystals refract light into multiple suns; rainbows appear, and every observer sees a different one.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Secrets of the Earth
channel.desc: Sinkholes generate far below the earth's surface and are capable of opening up across more than 20% of it.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weather Gone Viral
channel.desc: Motorists in India are stranded when a dangerous landslide takes over a half mile of highway; during the dry season, a city in South Africa receives more rain than it has seen in 20 years; an annual surfing competition in Hawaii takes a twist.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weather Gone Viral
channel.desc: Over 400 extreme wildfires in Chile burn out of control for three months, destroying over 1 million acres; high winds turn a massive catamaran sail into a wrecking ball; a record-breaking ice storm turns the streets of Seattle into a slip-and-slide.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Hurricane 360
channel.desc: In the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina, the city of New Orleans slips into anarchy as the residents struggle for survival.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Hurricane 360
channel.desc: Hurricane Irene carves a path of destruction along the East Coast; rivers reach hundred-year-flood levels or higher, washing whole towns and villages off the map.
